text: The Old Monk's Tale is a 1913 American drama film directed by J. Searle Dawley, produced by The Edison Company and released by General Film Company. It features the first known film appearance of Harold Lloyd as an uncredited Yaqui Indian at a party. ==Cast== * Ben F. Wilson as The Handsome Stranger (as Benjamin Wilson) * Laura Sawyer as Ramona, The Coquette * James Gordon as Allesandro * Charles Sutton as The Monk * Jessie McAllister as The Temptress * Harold Lloyd as Yaqui Indian (bit part) (uncredited) ==See also== * Harold Lloyd filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1913 films Category:1913 drama films Category:1913 short films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by J.
